item.description:
Join us for an informative and interesting roundtable discussion of the most common and important legal issues for startups. On hand will be legal experts on intellectual property, corporate, and employment law to answer your questions and offer advice on avoiding legal disputes and protecting your business. Joining us will be attorneys from the intellectual property firm Danielson Legal LLC, the corporate law firm VC Ready Law Group LLC, and the employment and labor law firm of Sanzone & McCarthy, LLP.

Please register through EventBrite here
item.name: ULS Legal Series
